name: @simpligov/simplidev-browser-extension
description: SimpliDev Browser Extension - Sid Voice browser control

scripts.build: tsc --project . && tsc --project tsconfig.ui.json && vite build && vite build --config vite.sw.config.mts
scripts.watch: tsc --watch --project . & tsc --watch --project tsconfig.ui.json & vite build --watch & vite build --watch --config vite.sw.config.mts
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../simplidev-browser-extension.zip . && cd ..
scripts.package:release: npm run package && cp simplidev-browser-extension.zip ../simplidev/resources/templates/ && node -p "require('./package.json').version" > ../simplidev/resources/templates/simplidev-browser-extension.zip.version && rm simplidev-browser-extension.zip
